summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and outside temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.3 mm), light levels (up 3021 lux), and cloud levels (up 441 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1375 m), light levels (up 5371 lux), feels like temperature (up 2.6°C), and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 441.2m lower than yesterday, 976.2m lower than past week, 1375.2m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1432.1m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2410m and 2810m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, very clammy and humid. Possible light showers, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and some sunny spells will occur. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
